metadata.name: metadata
metadata.description: Utilities for reading and writing the metadata of JavaScript functions.

Origin.name: Origin
Origin.description: A metadata annotation that describes the origin module of the function to which it's attached.

params.name: moduleMember
params.description: The name of the export in the origin module.

ResourceType.name: ResourceType
ResourceType.description: An abstract base class used to designate resources which can be loaded and registered in a framework.

classitems.description: Searches a function's metadata for an annotation of a particular type.
classitems.name: getAnnotation

params.name: fn
params.description: The function whose annotations are being inspected.

params.name: annotationType
params.description: The annotation type to look for.

return.description: Returns an instance of the specified annotation type if found; otherwise null.

classitems.description: Searches a function's metadata for all annotations of a particular type.
classitems.name: getAllAnnotations

params.name: fn
params.description: The function whose annotations are being inspected.

params.name: annotationType
params.description: The annotation type to look for.

return.description: Returns an array of the specified annotation type.

params.name: fn
params.description: The function being tagged with metadata.

classitems.description: Get the Origin annotation for the specified function.
classitems.name: get

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to inspect for Origin metadata.

classitems.description: Set the Origin annotation for the specified function.
classitems.name: set

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to set the Origin metadata on.

params.name: fn
params.description: The Origin metadata to store on the function.

classitems.description: Implemented by resource metadata to allow it to self-configure and load dependencies.
classitems.name: load

params.name: container
params.description: The dependency injection container to use for service resolution.

params.name: target
params.description: The target that is decorated by this ResourceType metadata.

return.description: Returns a promise for itself, resolving when all dependent resources are loaded.

classitems.description: Implemented by resources to allow them to register themselved in a resource registry.
classitems.name: register

params.name: registry
params.description: The resource registry that this resource needs to be registered in.

params.name: name
params.description: A possible name override for the resource.
